name: Skill-calculator
tagline: Skill Calculator for Tom Clancy's The Division
body:
### App shutdown notice
You see this, because the offical web application for the skill-calculator has been shutdown since it's not actively developed anymore. Also, i don't want to continue hosting and supporting this app since i don't have fun with the game anymore. I actually never enjoyed the game as i hoped it would and it quite disappointed me. 

### Farewell gift
It feels kinda wrong to just abandon this project. So because of this and to honor all the people who ever contributed something to the app i created executable versions for all major platforms so you can still use the app on your own machine.

### Download Standalone Version
* [Linux 32-bit](https://github.com/ununseptium/skill-calculator/releases/download/v3.0.0/Skill.Calculator-linux-ia32.tgz)
* [Linux 64-bit](https://github.com/ununseptium/skill-calculator/releases/download/v3.0.0/Skill.Calculator-linux-x64.tgz)
* [Windows 32-bit](https://github.com/ununseptium/skill-calculator/releases/download/v3.0.0/Skill.Calculator-win32-ia32.zip)
* [Windows 64-bit](https://github.com/ununseptium/skill-calculator/releases/download/v3.0.0/Skill.Calculator-win32-x64.zip)
* [Mac OS](https://github.com/ununseptium/skill-calculator/releases/download/v3.0.0/Skill.Calculator-darwin-x64.dmg)

### Thanks and goodbye
The last thing i have left to say is **thank you** to the division community and especially to the discord server community.

**Goodbye and game on**,

nevotheless
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
